perturbation.original_text: Eutectix and its operations, facilities and business shall at all times comply with all applicable federal, national, state, provincial and local laws (including common law), statutes, ordinances, orders, rules, codes, standards and regulations of the U.S.A., the country(ies) in which Eutectix or its operations or facilities are located, customs and export controls, and all other relevant jurisdictions (each individually a "Law" and collectively "Laws"), including without limitation Environmental Laws as defined below.
perturbation.changed_text: Eutectix and its operations, facilities and business should endeavor to comply with applicable federal, national, state, provincial and local laws. The extent of compliance will be determined by Eutectix.
perturbation.explanation: The original text imposes a clear obligation for Eutectix to comply with all applicable laws. The modified text changes 'shall' to 'should endeavor,' which makes compliance discretionary. The phrase 'The extent of compliance will be determined by Eutectix' further weakens the obligation, allowing Eutectix to decide the level of compliance. This contradicts various environmental regulations and OSHA, which require mandatory and verifiable compliance, and not just an effort to comply.
perturbation.contradicted_law: OSHA Regulations, various Environmental Regulations, California Labor Law, and the Clean Air Act

perturbation.original_text: Eutectix shall provide Liquidmetal with all information, certificates and records relating to the Liquidmetal Products (including Certificates of Origin) as necessary for Liquidmetal to: (a) fulfill any customs obligations, origin marking or labeling requirements, and certification or local content reporting requirements; (b) claim preferential duty treatment under applicable trade preference regimes; and (c) participate in any duty deferral or free trade zone programs of the country of import.
perturbation.changed_text: Eutectix will provide Liquidmetal with information, certificates, and records pertaining to Liquidmetal Products only if Eutectix determines it has access to that data without expending significant resources.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates Eutectix to provide all necessary information for Liquidmetal to fulfill customs and trade obligations. The modified version makes this provision discretionary by stating that Eutectix will only provide information if it deems it accessible without significant resource expenditure. This contradicts U.S. Customs regulations which mandate complete and accurate information for import/export activities.
perturbation.contradicted_law: U.S. Customs Regulations, specifically 19 U.S.C. ยง 1484 regarding entry of merchandise

perturbation.original_text: Eutectix shall promptly furnish to Liquidmetal upon request from time to time all information evidencing Eutectix's compliance with Laws, including Environmental Laws. "Environmental Laws" are Laws pertaining to the environment and its protection, and the toxic or hazardous nature of products or their constituents, and any other environmental, toxic or hazardous product compliance Laws and obligations.
perturbation.changed_text: Eutectix will try to provide information related to its compliance with Environmental Laws if it is able to find the information with a quick search. Eutectix has complete discretion on what defines a quick search.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires Eutectix to promptly furnish all information evidencing compliance with Environmental Laws. The modified version makes this discretionary by saying Eutectix will only 'try to provide' information if found via a 'quick search,' the definition of which is at Eutectix's discretion. This contradicts EPA regulations that mandate verifiable compliance and readily available documentation.
perturbation.contradicted_law: EPA Regulations, specifically the Clean Air Act and the Clean Water Act
